Cuma kadang suka banyak ibu2 arisan aja si di resto yg terlalu rame jadinya, hehe. But over all ok lah. Kolam renang juga bersih. Staf ramah2, resepsionis juga tanggap and responnya bagus. Ketinggalan jam tangan di kolam renang ternyata dibantu ambilin. 👍

text:
Yang paling mantap dari hotel ini adalah lokasinya yang strategis walau tidak di pinggir jalan besar. Menginap semalam di Hotel ini dalam rangka liburan, kami hanya parkir mobil di hotel (ada satpamnya yang ramah), selanjutnya kami berjalan kaki kemana-mana, antara lain makan di Momo Milk Barn, Kopi Nako & Two Stories, Asinan Ny Yenny. Berbelanja ke Ada dan Giant, beli buku ke Gramedia, beli baju di Factory Outlet DSE dan Grande.
Siapkan KTP Suami-Istri saat cek in. Yang berkesan, lobby nya wangi, sarapannya enak dan banyak pilihan untuk kelas hotel bintang 3 (ada egg station), desain lantai hotel unik, kamar mandinya tergolong mewah, serta disediakan perangkat sholat dalam kamar.
Kekurangan hanya kolam renang yang lebih cocok untuk anak-anak saja (kalau lihat dalam foto sepertinya besar). Selebihnya puas menginap di Sahira Butik Pakuan. Kami perhatikan sepertinya hotel sedang membangun perluasan di lahan sebelahnya, tapi saat kami menginap sama sekali tidak terdengar suara bising. Terima Kasih.
title: Hotel Syariah, Lokasi Mantap dan Bikin Kerasan

text:
Menginap di sini karena letaknya di tengah kota, dan bener aja.. mau kulineran cukup jalan kaki. Pas di seberang hot ada Resto de 'Leuit, Momo Milk Barn.. kl mau pizza bakar Kedai Kita tinggal jalan ke sebelah. agak geser dikit ada Nasi Dulang Cianjur Ibu Rahmawati. kalau mau ngopi cantik bisa ke Kopi Nako atau Two Stories yang cuma 600 meteran jaraknya dari hotel. 

Lanjut ke review kamar, kebetulan pesan deluxe king yg pool view. kamarnya ngga besar, tapi bersih dan nyaman. lantainya pakai keramik motif kayu bkn karpet (which is me likey!). dan krn konsepnya hotel syariah perlengkapan sholat sdh disediakan. perlu diperhatikan lantai kamar mandi yang cukup licin kalo basah dan sayangnya jg kaca cuma ada di kamar mandi, jd agak sedikit ribet aja kalo mo ngaca. utk shower jg lsg diatas kepala ya, jd kl mandi bakal basah dari ujung rambut ke ujung kaki. di sediain shower cap tapi krg membantu krn tipis bahannya jd tetep aja rambut basah.

Sarapan di Sahira ini lumayan enak walau menunya cukup standar dan krg variatif. Anak-anak saya usia 7th dan 9th kena charge 50rb/anak. dibawah usia itu kayanya msh aman.

kolam renang walau ga terlalu besar tapi bersih sdh cukup bgt utk nyenengin anak2.

So far pengalaman stay 2 malam di sini cukup nyaman, homey bgt (suasananya lebih mirip di rumah dibanding hotel), insyaa allah kl mau staycation di Bogor mau balik lg kesini.
title: Strategic and homey

Note that it is a Sharia hotel, so unmarried couple is not allowed to stay in one room.

text:
Formerly known as Hotel Pakuan Bogor and having major renovations and joint the Sahira Hotel chain. The hotel turns cleaner and bigger with additional proper size swimming pool. They have 2 pools, with the old one is in smaller size near the restaurant. This hotel has a shabby chic design dominated with white color furniture and floral print headboard. The room lighting is bright enough, but they have small inroom tv. No fridge. For moslem, they provide praying kits and Quran. The aircon works good, as well as the hot water shower. But the toilet smell and its cleanliness were the issues. No separator in the shower nor shower curtain, made the water splashed everywhere. They using rainfall shower head, which was good. The bedding is acceptable, but the cleanliness need some improvement.
Their restaurant is the strength point, which most of their menu were good. If you like spicy, then you should try their homemade chilli.
The staffs were good and friendly. The hotel location is in the middle of the city which easy to access almost everywhere. And there are numbers of good cafes in the neighborhood. 
If this hotel improves their inroom and bathroom cleanliness, I wouldn't mind to consider giving a 5 stars.
title: Their restaurant has tasty menus
